      • updateNames

        public void updateNames(User user)
        Update the list of users to match the database, but get only the user IDs and the names of the users If called by the chair or admin, this method will get all users If called by a faculty member, this method will get a list containing only that user
        Parameters:
        user - User user accessing the records (for authentication)

      • updateNames
